entry.title: Happy New Year!
entry.content:
Happy New Year to everyone! We're thrilled to share several exciting updates to our website and to kick off our fundraising efforts:

<ul> <li>We’ve added a <a href="/2025/news">News</a> section to the website, complete with an <a href="/2025/feed.xml">Atom Feed</a>.</li> <li>You can now find details about our <a href="/2025/reimbursement">travel reimbursement</a> program.</li> <li>Our fundraising initiatives start with the launch of our <a href="/2025/sponsors">corporate sponsorship information page</a>.</li> <li>A <a href="/2025/donate">donations</a> campaign is also in the works.</li> </ul>

entry.title: Libre Graphics Meeting 2025
entry.content:
The 18th annual Libre Graphics Meeting (LGM) will be held in Nuremberg, Germany on May 28-31, 2025.

<p>The Libre Graphics Meeting is an annual meeting on Free/Libre and Open Source software for graphics. For now, please see the <a href="/2025/call-for-participation">Call for Participation</a>, <strong>read it, share it and spread the word!</strong></p> <blockquote> <p>Thank you!</p> </blockquote>
